mapper.select: SELECT c.challenge_idx, c.challenge_limit, c.challenge_name, CASE WHEN c.challenge_type = "횟수" THEN COALESCE(COUNT(ct.card_transaction_idx), 0) WHEN c.challenge_type = "금액" THEN COALESCE(SUM(ct.amount), 0) END AS cardHistoryCount FROM challenge c LEFT JOIN card_transaction ct ON ct.card_transaction_date BETWEEN c.challenge_start_date AND c.challenge_end_date AND ct.card_transaction_description LIKE CONCAT('%', c.detailed_category, '%') AND ct.category_idx = c.category_idx WHERE c.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND c.is_delete = 0 AND is_public = 1 AND challenge_end_date >= CURDATE() AND challenge_status = '진행' GROUP BY c.challenge_idx, c.challenge_limit, c.challenge_type ORDER BY challenge_end_date ASC LIMIT 3;
